page.title: 04Carlton Pantomime
page.content: Carlton pantomine began last year with Aladdin.This year's 'Robinson Crusoe' was produced by Mrs.J.Atkin. We spoke to Jacqueline Everatt a member of our class who played Maria and married Robinson Crusoe. "When I auditioned, I didn't really expect to get a part, so you can imagine how thrilled I was to be chosen as principal girl. I was in the pantomime last year too and everybody involved has great fun." The money needed to finance the pantomime comes from the proceeds of Carlton Feast.In return any money made goes back to next year's Feast.The parts are issued at the beginning of December and rehearsals start in January with 4 nights a week,leading up to the actual performances of the pantomime in March. The Carlton annual pantomime is a must for everybody.
